visual_description.scene: test tube on LED panel (white backlight strip), side view
visual_description.view: frontal view of lower half of test tube

plasma.notes: dark zone visible in lower part of test tube -- sediment or clot; plasma fills test tube approximately halfway; marking visible at bottom; meniscus clearly visible at top

visual_description.scene: test tube held by hand on dark background, side view

plasma.notes: plasma shifted to one edge due to tilt; whitish meniscus/film visible on surface; small inclusions visible within plasma volume; test tube walls are transparent

visual_description.scene: test tube held by hand on dark background, macro photography
visual_description.view: side close-up of lower part of test tube

plasma.notes: large whitish clot/film clearly visible in upper part of liquid; clot has loose fibrous structure; plasma below is more transparent and yellow; pronounced stratification -- turbid top and more transparent bottom

visual_description.scene: Petri dish on dark textured surface, top view

plasma.notes: large translucent rounded gelatinous clot visible in Petri dish; clot occupies most of the dish; liquid fraction visible at clot edges; glare and small air bubbles noticeable on clot surface; edges of other test tubes visible nearby

visual_description.scene: test tube on LED panel (white backlight strip), side view
visual_description.view: frontal view of lower half of test tube

plasma.notes: darker zone visible in central and lower part -- sediment; compared to IMG_3312 the dark zone appears more pronounced; small bubbles visible on meniscus surface; test tube fill level similar

visual_description.scene: test tube held by hand on dark background, macro photography
visual_description.view: side close-up of lower part of test tube

plasma.notes: large whitish/milky clot clearly visible, occupying central part of test tube; clot has dense rounded shape with fibrous edges; plasma around clot is more transparent; upper part of liquid is hazy

visual_description.scene: Petri dish on dark textured surface, top view

plasma.notes: large teardrop-shaped gelatinous clot visible in dish; clot is translucent with whitish areas; glare visible on surface; liquid plasma fraction at edges; edges of test tubes visible nearby; textured dark surface under dish

visual_description.scene: test tube held by hand, backlit by LED panel from behind
visual_description.view: side close-up of lower part of test tube

plasma.notes: large whitish fibrous clot visible in upper part of liquid; clot is less dense than in other test tubes -- more loose and distributed; lower part of plasma is more transparent and yellow; thin thread-like structures visible in volume

visual_description.scene: test tube on LED panel (white backlight strip), side view
visual_description.view: frontal view of lower half of test tube

plasma.notes: plasma is more saturated yellow compared to other samples; dark sediment zone visible in lower part; meniscus clearly visible; small bubbles on surface; overall fill volume similar to other test tubes

visual_description.scene: Petri dish on dark textured surface, top view

plasma.notes: large translucent rounded gelatinous clot visible in dish; clot is denser and whiter than sample 19.5.1; whitish fibrous structures on clot surface; liquid fraction at edges; edges of other test tubes visible nearby; overall clot size comparable to previous samples
